PARAGRAPH.STRING: is a massive stratovolcano in the Andes on the Argentina-Chile border and the highest volcano in the world at 6,891 metres (22,608 ft).
is also the second highest mountain in the Western Hemisphere and the highest in Chile.
is located about north of Aconcagua, the highest mountain in the Western Hemisphere at 6962 m.

has very dry conditions with snow only remaining on the peak during winter. Despite the generally dry conditions, there is a permanent crater lake about 100 metres (300 ft) in diameter at an elevation of 6390 m on the eastern side of
. This is most likely the highest lake of any kind in the world.

is mostly a hike except for the final section to the summit which is a difficult scramble that may require ropes. The first ascent was made in 1937 by Jan Alfred Szczepa≈Ñski and Justyn Wojsznis, members of a Polish andinist expedition.
